Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Need something?<sp:5:0:0> Better make it quick—
I'm supposed to be on my way to the <clr:0000>Ring
Ruins <clr:ffff>in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>I really shouldn't be making conversation.<sp:5:0:0>
I'm supposed to be on my way to the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins in Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
Then again, when the sun goes down,
the monsters come out, so...maybe I'll
wait till morning.
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You probably know that fallen Zonai ruins
have been found all over the world since
the Upheaval.
Well, the ones at <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> have
been dubbed the "Ring Ruins," owing to
their distinctive <clr:0000>circular shapes<clr:ffff>.
There's also some stone slabs there with
words like "sage" and "Demon King"
carved in Zonai script.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The leader of our team—the best in the
world at deciphering Zonai script—is
heading up the investigation in person.
It's all very, very exciting. I just wish the
place was a little easier to get to...
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>If you want to go to Kakariko Village, just
head toward that ring-shaped thing in
the distance.
That's one of the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> Lots of folks
have been talking about that spot—in our
research team as well as the public.
Talk1014:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Then again, with this rain muddying up the road,
I might slip and break my neck, so maybe I'd better
hold off a little longer.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>I should get going too. My fellow
researchers will start wondering where
I am.
Talk1015:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Angry_01>Then again, my metal tools might attract lightning.<sp:5:0:0>
I'd better wait until the storm subsides.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>You need something else?<sp:5:0:0> Like I said,
I should really start heading to the <clr:0000>Ring
Ruins <clr:ffff>in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Kakariko Village is hidden away in a
mountain range. Even with a landmark to
go by, I worry I'll get lost.
Maybe I'll run through the directions a
few more times in my head...
Talk1007:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Ease_01>Then again, with the sun up, it'll be easy for
monsters to see me.<sp:5:0:0> Probably best to wait.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Fair warning—you'll run into some
tourists. They've been flocking to the
ruins lately.
Talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_00>Then again, monsters come out in full
force at night, so why risk it?<sp:5:0:0> I'll depart
at sunup.
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>If you <clr:0000>head south <clr:ffff>on the road from this
stable, you'll come upon a crossroad that
takes you to the mountains.
Head all the way down that crossroad and
you'll be in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>It's a bit easier to find after the <clr:0000>Ring
Ruins <clr:ffff>fell, since you can use them as
a landmark.
